title: Harassment from player after ranked

replies.body:
I've edited out the name. Please adhere to the rules on the boards. The place to report this is player support.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

A handy tip is to not add people after game if they were not pleasant in game. Remember it's a friends list for a reason.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=vAEAYOyN,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-13T01:53:24.758+0000)
>
> I've edited out the name. Please adhere to the rules on the boards. The place to report this is player support.
> 
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
> 
> A handy tip is to not add people after game if they were not pleasant in game. Remember it's a friends list for a reason.

You went to all that trouble to edit an offender's name out of a post. But did not mention if you were going to look into it.
The impression I got from reading this post was you invited the murder into your house it is your own fault if you get murdered.

It wasn't too much effort I just did control F replace name with Rengar. =)

I apologise though if that is what you got out of my post, it was merely a tip to prevent it from happening in future. We are definitely going to investigate as soon as its reported through the correct channel. Behaviour like that is 100% not acceptable in our community.

I only accepted to see where his attitude would go and and it was apparent straight away. 
But no worries will also head there.

If Marauder wants to check the game logs for that one, was around 830am today.

Sorry for the naming, but it's all there.
